    Low-Carbon Manufacturing of Ti–Si–C Ceramics Using Geopolymer-Binder-Integrated Reactive Feedstocks

    Published in ACS Sustainable Chemistry & Engineering, 2024

    This paper is about the number 3. The number 4 is left for future work.

    Recommended citation: Liu, Ruochen, et al. "Low-Carbon Manufacturing of Ti–Si–C Ceramics Using Geopolymer-Binder-Integrated Reactive Feedstocks." ACS Sustainable Chemistry & Engineering 12.12 (2024): 4858-4866. https://pubs.acs.org/doi/full/10.1021/acssuschemeng.3c07159
